subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: The 2012 Tour de France began Saturday with a prologue in Liège, Belgium, as Fabian Cancellara of Switzerland won the time trial for a fifth time.
snippet: The 2012 Tour de France began Saturday with a prologue in Liège, Belgium, as Fabian Cancellara of Switzerland won the time trial for a fifth time.
